```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggExtra)
```
```{r}
getwd( )
```


```{r}
library(readr)
Cac_size <- read_csv("Cac_size.csv")
View(Cac_size)
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(Cac_size, aes(x = Genome, y = Size (bp))) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggsave("myplot.png")
```

```{r}
library("ggplotgui")

ggplot_shiny(Cac_size)
```


```{r}
View(p)
```

```{r}

ggplot(Cac_size, aes(x = Genome, y = "Size (bp)" )) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") 

```

```{r}
ggplot(Cac_size, aes(x = Genome, y = "Size (bp)")) +
  geom_col()
scale_y_continuous(name="Size (bp)", limits=c(2300000, 2640000))
```

```{r}
ggplot(Cac_size) +
  aes(x = Genome, y = "Size (bp)") +
  geom_jitter() +
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(angle = 45)) 

```

```{r}
order(Cac_size$Size)
```

```{r}
Cac_Size_order <- Cac_size[order(Cac_size$Size),]
```

```{r}
ggplot(Cac_Size_order) +
  aes(x = Genome, y = Size) +
  geom_jitter() +
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(angle = 45)) 

```
